steps.text: Check Telegram Room Reset Instructions for your section's requirements
Bring any OWN or HD chairs (permanent white tags) with you to new section
Go to your NEW section (not old one)
If DEPOSITING: Remove excess chairs from NEW section, remove reserved signs first, bring to central bank, post: '[Color] deposited [#]'
Place reserved signs in remaining chairs
If PICKING UP: Get chairs from central bank ONLY (never from walls or other sections), add to section, maintain aisle integrity, place reserved signs
Verify chairs are open, locked, stable
Count total, post: '[Color] [final#]' - Must match Room Reset Lead's posted number. If doesn't match, contact Lead immediately

sections.title: Special Notes
notes: HD = Heavy Duty chair for extra support (white tag)
Reserved signs removed last lecture before CH
If dinner before reset: deposit chairs first, then eat
